src: بسبب حرارة النهار، احتمال يشوف المسافرين السراب اللي يوهم بوجود الماء (أو أشياء أخرى). هالشي ممكن يكون خطير إذا سعى المسافر وره السراب، وصرف الطاقة الثمينة والمياه الباقية. وحتى أشد الصحاري حرارة ممكن تصير باردة كلش بالليل. يعتبر انخفاض حرارة الجسم خطر حقيقي بدون لبس ملابس دافية.
mt: Because of the heat, people may see mirages that appear to be water (or other things). This can be dangerous if a traveler pursues the mirage, wasting valuable energy and water. Even the hottest deserts can be cold at night. Hypothermia is a real danger without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: جمهورية الدومينيكان (بالإسبانية: ريبوبليكا الدومينيكان) هي البلد الكاريبي اللي  تحتل مساحته النصف الشرقي من جزيرة هيسبانيولا، اللي تشترك مع هايتي. بالاضافة للشواطئ ذات الرمال البيضاء والمناظر الطبيعية الجبلية، تعتبر البلاد موطن لأقدم مدينة أوروبية بالأمريكتين، وهي اليوم جزء من سانتو دومينغو. سكنوا هذي الجزيرة لأول مرة شعب التاينو والكاريبي. كانوا الكاريبيون من الأشخاص الناطقين باللغة الآراواكانية، ووصلوا هناك حوالي عام ١٠٠٠٠ قبل الميلاد. خفض الغزاة الأسبان تعداد سكان التاينو بصورة كبيرة خلال كم سنة بعد وصول المستكشفين الأوروبيين. وحسب كلام الراهب بارتولومي دي لاس كاساس (معاهدة جزر الهند)، قتل الغزاة الإسبان حوالي 100,000 من شعب التاينوس ما بين عام 1492 و1498.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is the eastern half of the Caribbean island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In addition to its white-sand beaches and mountainous landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taíno and Arawak peoples. The Taíno were the indigenous people of the Caribbean, and spoke the Arawakan language. They arrived in the Caribbean around 1000 BC. The Taíno were decimated by Spanish colonizers between 1492 and 1498, according to the writings of the friar Bartolomé de las Casas (Treatise on the Indies).
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: """الرياضات الثلجية على المنحدرات، واللي تشمل التزلج والتزحلق على الجليد، هي من الرياضات الشعبية اللي تنطوي على الانزلاق إلى أسفل منطقة من الأرض مغطاة بالثلوج بواسطة الزلاجات أو لوح التزلج المثبتة برجليك. يعتبر التزلج نشاط رئيسي خلال السفر وبي عدد كبير من المتحمسين، واللي يسموهم مرات """"متشردي التزلج""""، ويخططون يقضون إجازات كاملة  للتزلج بمكان معين. فكرة التزلج قديمة كلش — ويرجع تاريخ لوحات الكهوف اللي تصور المتزلجين إلى سنة ٥٠٠٠ قبل الميلاد! يرجع تاريخ التزلج على المنحدرات كرياضة إلى القرن السابع عشر على الأقل، وبعام 1861 تم افتتاح أول نادي تزلج ترفيهي بواسطة النرويجيين بأستراليا."""
mt: """Downhill skiing and snowboarding, which involve sliding down a snow-covered slope using skis or a snowboard attached to boots, is a popular recreational activity. Skiing is a major part of winter tourism, with many ski resorts located in mountainous regions. The idea of skiing is ancient, with cave paintings showing skiers dating back to 5000 BC. Downhill skiing as a sport is at least as old as the 17th century, and the first ski club was founded in 1861 by Norwegians in Australia."""
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: تقع جزر شرق إفريقيا بالمحيط الهندي قبالة الساحلِ الشرقي لأفريقيا. جزيرة إن مدغشقر هي الأكبر على الإطلاق، وهي قارة مستقلة لمن يتعلق الأمر بالحياة البرية. معظم الجزر الصغيرة هي دول مستقلة، أو مرتبطة بفرنسا، وتعرف باسم المنتجعات الشاطئية الفاخرة. حمل العرب الإسلام للبلاد، وانتشر على نطاق واسع بجزر القمر ومايوت. بده النفوذ والاستعمار الأوروبي بالقرن الخامس عشر، ولكَه المستكشف البرتغالي فاسكو دا غاما طريق كيب من أوروبا إلى الهند.
mt: The East African islands are in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and is a separate continent for the purposes of wildlife. Most of the small islands are independent countries, or are part of France, and are known as the luxury beach resorts. The Arabs brought Islam to the land, and spread widely to the Comoros and Mayotte. The European influence and colonization of the fifteenth century, but the Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: أكو تقليد عبارة عن الاستيقاظ طول ليلة عيد الفصح لحد نهايتها بمكان مكشوف ومشاهدة شروق الشمس. من الممكن بكل تأكيد تفسير هذا التقليد من وجهة نظر لاهوتية مسيحية، بس أكو احتمال أن يكون طقس ديني لفصل الربيع والخصوبة من قبل زمن المسيحية. تقيم الكنائس الأكثر تقليدية غالباً صلاة عشية عيد الفصح بيوم السبت خلال نهاية أسبوع الفصح، وغالباً ما تبدي التجمعات بالاحتفال ببعث السيد المسيح عند حلول منتصف الليل.
mt: The custom of staying up all night until sunrise on Easter Sunday is certainly a Christian theological interpretation, but it is also possible that it is a pagan spring fertility rite.  More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night before Easter Sunday, and often the gatherings celebrate the resurrection of Jesus Christ at midnight.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: تشترط دولة الإكوادور أن توصل للمواطنين الكوبيين خطاب دعوة قبل دخولهم دولة الإكوادور عن طريق المطارات الدولية أو نقاط الدخول الحدودية. لازم يكون هذا الخطاب مصدق من وزارة الخارجية الإكوادورية، ويتوافق ويه شروط معينة. انحطت هذي الشروط حتى تضمن تدفق هجرة مُنظم بين البلدين. لازم على المواطنين الكوبيين الحاملين لبطاقة الإقامة الأمريكية الدائمة زيارة مقر قنصلية الإكوادور حتى يحصلون على إعفاء من هذا الشرط. لازم يكون جواز السفر الخاص بيك ساري المفعول لمدة 6 أشهر على الأقل بعد تواريخ السفر الخاصة بيك. ولازم يكون عندك تذكرة ذهاب وعودة حتى تثبت مدة إقامتك.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to obtain an invitation letter from the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs before entering Ecuador through international airports or border crossings. This letter must be approved and meet certain requirements. These requirements ensure the orderly flow of migration between the two countries. Cuban citizens with a valid U.S. permanent residence card must visit the Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after your travel dates. You must have a round-trip ticket to prove your length of stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: احتمال يكون سعر النظارات الشمسية أقل بالبلاد الأجنبية، خاصة بالبلاد منخفضة الدخل اللي تكون تكلفة العمالة بيها أقل. أخذ بنظر الاعتبار مسألة إجراء فحص العين ببلدك، وخاصةً إذا كان التأمين يغطي هذا الفحص، وتقديم الوصفة الطبية بمكان ثاني. ممكن تواجه الإطارات من الماركات الراقية المتوفرة بهذي المناطق مشكلتين؛ممكن تكون بعضها مقلدة، أو تكون المنتجات المستوردة الأصلية أغلى منها بموطنها.
mt: It is possible that the price of sunglasses is lower in foreign countries, especially in low-income countries where the cost of labor is lower. Consider the issue of eye examination in your country, especially if the insurance covers this examination, and presenting the prescription in another place. You may face problems with the tires from the premium brands available in these areas; some may be counterfeit, or the original imported products may be more expensive than their homeland.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: عملة فوكلاند الرسمية هي الجنيه الفوكلاندي (FKP) اللي يتم تحديد قيمته معادلة بـقيمة الجنيه الاسترليني (GBP). تكَدر تبدل الفلوس بالبنك الوحيد بالجزر اللي صاير بستانلي مقابل محل FIC West. يتم قبول الجنيه الاسترليني بشكل عام بأي مكان بالجزر وداخل بطاقات ستانلي الائتمانية والدولار الأمريكي بأغلب الاحيان. بالجزر النائية، أكو احتمال إنو ما يقبلون بطاقات الائتمان، بالرغم من إنو ممكن قبول العملة البريطانية والعملة الأمريكية؛ لازم تسئل المالكين ليكَدام حتى تعرف طرق الدفع المقبولة. من المستحيل تقريباً صرف عملة فوكلاندس خارج الجزر، لذلك لازم تصرف فلوس قبل ما تعوف الجزر.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged to the British pound sterling (GBP). The Falkland pound can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands, the FIC West. The British pound is generally accepted anywhere on the islands and within Stanleys credit cards, and the US dollar is usually accepted. In the remote islands, there is a chance that credit cards are not accepted, but British and American currency is accepted; ask the owners to find out what forms of payment are accepted. It is almost impossible to exchange Falkland pounds outside the islands, so you should exchange money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: أغلب المعابد عدها مهرجان سنوي يبدي من نهاية تشرين الثاني ولحد منتصف أيار، واللي يختلف حسب التقويم السنوي لكل معبد. يتم الاحتفال بأغلب مهرجانات المعبد كجزء من الذكرى السنوية للمعبد أو عيد ميلاد الإله أو أي حدث كبير آخر مرتبط بالمعبد. مهرجانات معبد كيرالا جديرة بالمتابعة، وتتضمن موكب منظم من الفيلة المزينة، أوركسترا المعابد واحتفالات أخرى.
mt: Most temples celebrate a yearly festival that lasts from November to May, depending on the temple's calendar. Most temple festivals are part of the temple's annual celebration or the birthday of the deity or any other major event related to the temple. Festivals of the Kerala Kalamandalam are worth following, and include a well-organized procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestras, and other celebrations.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: الطريقة البديهية حتى تكَدر تسافر على الدرجة الأولى أو درجة رجال الأعمال هي تخصيص مبلغ مالي كبير حتى تحصل على هذا الامتياز (أو الأفضل إنو تخلي شركتك تسوي هالشي). مع ذلك، هالشي ميجي بلاش: كقاعدة عامة، توقع أن تدفع حوالي أربع أضعاف تكلفة الدرجة الاقتصادية العادية التجارية، و11 ضعف للدرجة الأولى! بصفة عامة، ماكو فايدة تدور خصومات لمقاعد فئة رجال الأعمال أو الدرجة الأولى على الرحلات المباشرة من A إلى B. الخطوط الجوية تعرف كلش زين إنو أكو مجموعة رئيسية محددة من المسافرين مستعدين يدفعون هوايه فلوس مقابل أفضلية الوصول إلى مكان معين بسرعة وبراحة، ويتم التعامل وياهم على هذا الأساس.
mt: The obvious way to travel in first or business class is to set aside a large amount of money to get this privilege (or better yet, have your company do it). However, this is not always the case: in general, you can expect to pay about four times the cost of the regular commercial economy class, and 11 times for first class! In general, there is no point in looking for discounts for business or first class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know that there is a core group of travelers willing to pay a premium to get to a specific place quickly and comfortably, and they deal with them accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: الطريقة البديهية حتى تكَدر تسافر على الدرجة الأولى أو درجة رجال الأعمال هي تخصيص مبلغ مالي كبير حتى تحصل على هذا الامتياز (أو الأفضل إنو تخلي شركتك تسوي هالشي). مع ذلك، هالشي ميجي بلاش: كقاعدة عامة، توقع أن تدفع حوالي أربع أضعاف تكلفة الدرجة الاقتصادية العادية التجارية، و11 ضعف للدرجة الأولى! بصفة عامة، ماكو فايدة تدور خصومات لمقاعد فئة رجال الأعمال أو الدرجة الأولى على الرحلات المباشرة من A إلى B. الخطوط الجوية تعرف كلش زين إنو أكو مجموعة رئيسية محددة من المسافرين مستعدين يدفعون هوايه فلوس مقابل أفضلية الوصول إلى مكان معين بسرعة وبراحة، ويتم التعامل وياهم على هذا الأساس.
mt: The obvious way to travel in first or business class is to set aside a large amount of money to get this privilege (or better yet, have your company do it). However, this is not always the case: in general, you can expect to pay about four times the cost of the regular commercial economy class, and 11 times for first class! In general, there is no point in looking for discounts for business or first class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know that there is a core group of travelers willing to pay a premium to get to a specific place quickly and comfortably, and they deal with them accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: الخطوط الجوية مثل طيران الإمارات والاتحاد للطيران والخطوط الجوية القطرية وصلت خدماتها لأفريقيا، وتوفر رحلات إلى هوايه من المدن الإفريقية بأسعار أفضل من الخطوط الجوية الأوروبية. تقدم الخطوط الجوية التركية رحلات طيران  لـ 39 وجهة بـ30 دولة أفريقية، وذلك اعتباراً من 2014. إن كان عندك وقت إضافي خلال السفر، فقارن بين إجمالي سعر أجرة السفر الخاص بيك إلى أفريقيا بالنسبة لأجرة سفرك حول العالم. تذكر تضيف التكاليف الزايدة للفيزات الإضافية وضرائب المغادرة والنقل البري إلخ... لكل الأماكن اللي خارج إفريقيا.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad and Qatar Airways have brought their services to Africa, offering flights to Hoedspoit from African cities at better prices than European airlines. Turkish Airlines offers flights to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have extra time during your travel, compare the total cost of your travel to Africa with the cost of your travel around the world. Remember to add additional visa fees, departure taxes, and land transport to all places outside Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: بالعادة يكون شراء الأكل من محلات السوبر ماركت أرخص وسيلة حتى تحصل على أكل.  بس راح  تكون الخيارات الموجودة هي الأكل الجاهز في حال ماكو فرصة للطبخ. وصارت أغلب محلات السوبر عدها أقسام للأكل الجاهز أكثر تنوع. حتى إنو قسم منها بيها فرن ميكروويف أو وسائل ثانية تحمي بيها الأكل. بقسم من البلدان أو نوع من المحلات التجارية أكو على الأقل مطعم واحد بالموقع، وعالأغلب يكون مطعم مو رسمي بأسعار مقبولة.
mt: Usually buying food from supermarkets is the cheapest way to get food.  But it will be the ready-to-eat options in case there is no opportunity to cook.  And most supermarkets have more sections of ready-to-eat food with more variety.  Even if there is a microwave oven or other means to keep the food warm.  In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant on the site, and most of them are official restaurants with reasonable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: تختلف اللهجات الفرنسية المستخدمة بالكلام  ببلجيكا وسويسرا اختلاف طفيف عن الفرنسية المستخدمة بفرنسا، على الرغم من أنها متشابهة بما يكفي حتى تكون مفهومة بشكل متبادل. على وجه الخصوص، يتسم نظام الترقيم ببلجيكا وسويسرا الناطقين باللغة الفرنسية ببعض الخصائص الطفيفة اللي تختلف عن الفرنسية المستخدمة بفرنسا، كما إنو نطق بعض الكلمات يختلف اختلاف طفيف. ومع ذلك، يتعلم جميع الناطقين بالفرنسية من البلجيكيين والسويسريين اللغة الفرنسية القياسية بالمدارس، لذا، راح يكَدرون يفهموك حتى إذا استخدمت النظام العددي الفرنسي القياسي.
mt: The French dialects used in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French used in France, although they are mutually intelligible enough to be understood. In particular, the Belgian and Swiss French number system has some minor differences from the French used in France, as well as some slight differences in the pronunciation of some words. However, all French speakers learn the standard French language in school, so they will be able to understand it even if the number system is used.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: عدد قليل فقط من شركات الطيران بعدها تقدم أسعار مخصصة للأشخاص اللي عدهم حالة وفاة، وهالشي يقلل شوية من تكلفة السفر لحضور جنازة بآخر لحظة. من الخطوط الجوية اللي توفر هالشي هي طيران كندا، وخطوط دلتا الجوية، ولوفتهانزا للرحلات القادمة من الولايات المتحدة أو كندا، وويست جيت. بكل الأحوال، لازم تحجز بالتليفون مباشرة ويه شركة الطيران.
mt: Only a few airlines offer special fares for people with a death in the family, which reduces the cost of travel at the last minute. Airlines that offer this are Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. However, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: ممكن يكون استخدام تطبيقات نظام تحديد المواقع العالمي (GPS) على موبايلك أسهل الطرق وأكثرها راحة للتنقل ببلد غير بلدك. هالشي يمكنك من توفير المال من خلال شراء خرائط جديدة لنظام تحديد المواقع العالمي (GPS)، أو جهاز مستقل لنظام تحديد المواقع العالمي (GPS)، أو ايجار جهاز من شركة لتأجير السيارات. إذا ما كان عندك اتصال بالإنترنت بتلفونك، أو إذا كان خارج التغطية، فممكن يكون أداءه محدود أو غير متاح.
mt: Using GPS apps on your phone may be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate in a country other than your own. This can save you money by not having to buy new GPS maps, or a separate GPS device, or renting one from a car rental company. If you have Internet access on your phone, or if you are out of range, performance may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: أفضل طريقة حتى تشوف المواقع والحياة البرية بجزر غالاباغوس هي بالقارب، بالضبط مثل ما سوه تشارلز داروين بعام 1835. أكو أكثر من 60 سفينة سياحية تفتر بمياه جالاباجوس كل وحدة منها تشيل 8 إلى 100 راكب. يحجز أغلب الناس أماكنهم قبل وكت(لأن القوارب عادة تكون مقبطة خلال موسم الذروة). تأكد من أن الوكيل اللي راح تحجز عن طريقه متخصص بجزر جالاباجوس وعنده معرفة واسعة بمجموعات متنوعة من السفن. هالشي راح يضمن أن تكون السفينة ملائمة لاهتماماتك و/أو قيودك اللي تحددها.
mt: The best way to see the islands and wildlife of the Galapagos is by boat, just like Charles Darwin did in 1835. There are more than 60 tourist ships cruising the waters of the Galapagos, each carrying 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their trips well in advance (as boats are often booked out during peak season). Make sure that the agent you book through is an expert on the Galapagos Islands and has a wide knowledge of the different types of boats. This will ensure that the boat is suitable for your interests and/or constraints.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: تبذل الكازينوهات عادة هوايه جهد  حتى يبقى الضيوف وقت أطول ويصرفون فلوس أكثر. عادة يكون المكان بدون شبابيك أو ساعات، ومرات  يكون من الصعب أن تلكيَ أبواب الخروج. عادةً تكون عدهم وجبات خاصة، ومشروبات، وعروض ترفيهية، حتى يحافظون على مزاج الضيوف الجيد، ويبقون بالمكان. تقدم بعض الأماكن مشروبات كحولية مجاناً، بس السُكر يعيق الحُكم الصحيح على الأمور وكل المقامرين الجيدين يعرفون أهمية أن يبقى المقامر صاحي.
mt: Casinos often go to great lengths to keep patrons there as long as possible and spend as much money as possible. Often there are no windows or clocks, and it can be difficult to find the exit. Some places offer free drinks, but sugar impairs judgment and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: كل الأسماء، بالإضافة إلى كلمة Sie بالنسبة إلك، تبدي دائماً بحرف كبير، حتى بمنتصف الجملة. وهذي طريقة هامة حتى تميز بين بعض الأفعال وأسماء الأشياء. نكَدر نكَول أنو يخلي القراءة أسهل، على الرغم من أن الكتابة معقدة إلى حد ما بسبب الحاجة إلى معرفة ما إذا كان الفعل أو الصفة يستخدمان بشكل مثبت.
mt: All names, including Sie, are always capitalized, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and nouns. We can say that it makes reading easier, although writing is somewhat complicated due to the need to know whether the verb or adjective is used as a noun.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: """بالعديد من أنحاء العالم، يُعتبر التلويح لفتة ودية معناها""""مرحباً"""". ومع ذلك، بماليزيا، وعلى الأقل بين الملايو بالأرياف، يعني ذلك """"تعال""""، على غرار حني السبابة اتجاه الجسم، وهي إشارة تُستعمل ببعض الدول الغربية وما يصير استعمالها إلا لهذا الغرض. وعلى نحو مماثل، ممكن يغلط مسافر بريطاني بأسبانيا بتلويح الوداع من راحة اليد المواجهة للشخص اللي يلوح (بدال الشخص اللي يتم التلويح إليه) كإشارة للعودة."""
mt: "In many parts of the world, a wave is a friendly gesture meaning "hello". However, in Malaysia, at least among the rural Malays, it means "come here", similar to the thumbs-up gesture used in some Western countries and only for this purpose. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain may be mistaken for a wave of farewell from the palm of the hand facing the person waving (instead of the person being waved to) as a gesture of return."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: """بالعديد من أنحاء العالم، يُعتبر التلويح لفتة ودية معناها""""مرحباً"""". ومع ذلك، بماليزيا، وعلى الأقل بين الملايو بالأرياف، يعني ذلك """"تعال""""، على غرار حني السبابة اتجاه الجسم، وهي إشارة تُستعمل ببعض الدول الغربية وما يصير استعمالها إلا لهذا الغرض. وعلى نحو مماثل، ممكن يغلط مسافر بريطاني بأسبانيا بتلويح الوداع من راحة اليد المواجهة للشخص اللي يلوح (بدال الشخص اللي يتم التلويح إليه) كإشارة للعودة."""
mt: "In many parts of the world, a wave is a friendly gesture meaning "hello". However, in Malaysia, at least among the rural Malays, it means "come here", similar to the thumbs-up gesture used in some Western countries and only for this purpose. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain may be mistaken for a wave of farewell from the palm of the hand facing the person waving (instead of the person being waved to) as a gesture of return."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: الأنهار الجليدية مو مستقرة، بس تجري أسفل الجبل وهالشي يسبب حدوث تشققات وصدوع عميقة قد تحجبها الجسور الجليدية. ممكن تنهار جدران وسقوف الكهوف الجليدية وممكن تنسد فتحاتها. تنفصل كتل ضخمة عند حواف الأنهار الجليدية وتوكَع أو تتطفر واحتمال تروح بعيد عن الحافة.
mt: Glacial rivers are not stable, but flow under the mountain and this causes cracks and deep crevasses that may be blocked by glacial dams. The walls and ceilings of glacial caves may collapse and the entrances may be blocked. Large chunks may break off at the edges of glacial rivers and calve or drift away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: """غوما هي مدينة سياحية بجمهورية الكونغو الديمقراطية تقع بأقصى الشرق بالقرب من رواندا. بسنة 2002 تدمرت غوما بسبب حمم بركان نيراجونجو واللي طمرت معظم شوارع المدينة، وبالأخص ومركز المدينة. على الرغم من أن """"غوما"""" آمنة نسبياً، لازم التأكد قبل إجراء  أي زيارات خارج """"غوما""""، لفهم حالة القتال المستمر بمقاطعة شمال """"كيفو"""". وتعتبر المدينة قاعدة لتسلق بركان نيراجونجو ومن أرخص وسائل تتبع الغوريلا الجبلية بإفريقيا. تكَدر تركب البودا بودا (وهي عبرة عن ماطور يستخدم كتكسي) للتجول بمدينة غوما، والسعر المعتاد (محلياً) حوالي 500 فرنك كونغوليٍ مقابل رحلة قصيرة."""
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, located in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by the lava of the Nyiragongo volcano, which buried most of the city's streets, especially the city center. Although Goma is relatively safe, it is advisable to check before making any visits outside Goma, to understand the state of the ongoing war in North Kivu province. Goma is the base for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano and one of the cheapest ways to track the mountain gorillas in Africa. The boda boda (a motorcycle taxi) can be used to travel around Goma, the usual local price (local) is about 500 Congolese francs for a short trip.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: يتطلب أي مخيم أسفل الحافة بغراند كانيون تصريح للتخييم الليلي. تقتصر التصاريح على حماية الوادي، وتكون متوفرة باليوم الأول من الشهر، قبل أربع أشهر من شهر البدء. وبالتالي، أي تصريح دخول للريف الخلفي بأي تاريخ بدء بأيار، يصير متاح بـ1 كانون الثاني. تمتلي عموماً مساحة المناطق الأكثر شعبية، مثل برايت إنجل كامب غراوند المجاورة لـفانتوم رانتش، بالطلبات الجاية بالتاريخ الأول، واللي يتم فتحها للحجز. يتوفر عدد محدود من التصاريح المخصصة للطلبات المباشرة ويتم معالجة هذي  الطلبات حسب مبدأ ألأولوية بالأسبقية.
mt: Any camp below the rim of Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are issued for protection of the canyon, and are available on the first day of the month, four months prior to the start of the month. Thus, any backcountry permit for any start date in May will be available on January 1. The most popular areas, such as Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, are generally released on the first day, and are available for reservation. A limited number of permits are available for walk-up requests, and these are processed on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: بعض الفنادق إلها تراث من العصر الذهبي للقطارات البخارية والبواخر اللي تسير بخطوط منتظمة؛ قبل الحرب العالمية الثانية، بالقرن التاسع عشر أو أوائل القرن العشرين. كانت هذي  الفنادق هي المكان اللي ينزلون بي الأغنياء والمشاهير بحينها، وغالباً ما كان عدهم أكل طيب وحياة ليلية. تمثل تركيبات الأثاث قديمة الطراز وعدم توافر وسائل الراحة الحديثة وجمال الطراز العتيق صفة مميزة لطابعها. بينما تكون عادةً مملوكة ملكية خاصة، بس تستوعب رؤساء الدول الزائرين أحياناً وغيرهم من الشخصيات المهمة. ممكن يفكر المسافر اللي عنده فلوس هوايه أن يسافر حول العالم مع إقامات متقطعة بعدد من هذي  الفنادق.
mt: Some hotels are heritage from the golden age of steam trains and paddle steamers on regular lines; before World War II, in the nineteenth century or early twentieth century. These hotels were where the rich and famous would disembark, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The antique furniture and lack of modern amenities and the antique style are a distinctive feature of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they occasionally accommodate visiting heads of state and other important personalities. The traveler who has money to spare may travel around the world with intermittent stays at a number of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: """بفضل روابط كيبلات الألياف الضوئية الموجودة تحت سطح البحر إلى أوروبا والأقمار الصناعية ذات النطاق العريض، فإن غرينلاند عدها اتصال جيد بالإنترنت حيث 93٪ من السكان عدهم اتصال بالإنترنت. غالباً ما راح يكون بفندقك أو مضيفيك (إذا كنت راح تنزل بدار ضيافة أو بيت خاص) شبكة wifi أو حاسوب متصل بالإنترنت، وكل التجمعات بيها مقهى إنترنت أو موقع مخصص بي شبكة wifi عامة. مثل ما مذكور أعلاه، على الرغم من أن كلمة """"إسكيمو"""" ما زالت مقبولة بأمريكا، فإنها تعتبر تحقير من قبل العديد من سكان القطب الشمالي غير الأمريكيين وخاصةً بكندا. بالرغم من استخدام سكان غرينلاند الأصليين كلمة إسكيمو، فمو لازم يستخدموها الأجانب. يُطلق السكان الأصليين لغرينلاند على أنفسهم اسم الإنويت بكندا وكلاليك (مفرد كالاليت)، من سكان غرينلاند بغرينلاند. بالواقع، فإن الجريمة وسوء النية تجاه الأجانب، هي شي نادر الحدوث بشكل عام بغرينلاند. حتى بالبلدات، ماكو شي اسمه """"مناطق خطر"""". احتمال يكون الجو البارد هو الخطر الحقيقي الوحيد اللي راح يواجهه الأشخاص اللي مو متحضرين إله. إذا زرت غرينلاند خلال المواسم الباردة (مع الأخذ بعين الاعتبار أنك كلما توجهت للشمال يصير الجو أكثر برودة)، فمن الضروري أن تجيب ملابس دافية. ممكن أن تسبب  فترة النهار الطويلة كلش بالصيف إلى مشاكل بالحصول على نوم كافي والمشاكل الصحية المرتبطة بهالشي. خلال فصل الصيف، ديرو بالكم من البكَ النوردي فعلى الرغم  أنه ما ينقل أي أمراض، بس مرات يكون مزعج."""
mt: """Thanks to undersea fiber-optic cables to Europe and geostationary satellites, Greenland has good Internet access where 93% of the population have Internet access. Most hotels and guesthouses will have WiFi or a computer with Internet access, and most settlements have an Internet cafe or a public WiFi hotspot. As mentioned above, although the word "Eskimo" is still accepted in the United States, it is considered derogatory by many non-American Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. Despite the use of the word Eskimo by Greenland's indigenous population, foreigners should not use it. Greenland's indigenous population refer to themselves as Inuit in Canada and Kalaallit (singular Kalaaleq) in Greenland. In general, crime and ill will towards foreigners is rare in Greenland. Even in the settlements, there are no "danger zones". The only real danger you are likely to encounter is the cold. If you visit Greenland during the winter (with the exception of the southern settlements), you will need to bring warm clothing. The long summer days can cause problems with getting enough sleep and the health problems associated with this. During the summer, there are many Northern Lights, although they do not cause any health problems, they can be annoying. ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

Even in the settlements, there are no "danger zones". The only real danger you are likely to encounter is the cold. If you visit Greenland during the winter (with the exception of the southern settlements), you will need to bring warm clothing. The long summer days can cause problems with getting enough sleep and the health problems associated with this. During the summer, there are many Northern Lights, although they do not cause any health problems, they can be annoying. ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: حديقة الاتحاد. بُنيت حتى تكون بهو لدير من القرن السابع عشر، يعتبر معبد سان دييجو البناية الوحيد الباقية منه. تستخدم  اليوم كساحة مركزية، ودائماً ما تصير بيها هواية أحداث ليلاً ونهاراً. أكو عدد من المطاعم المحيطة بالحديقة، وغالباً ما تصير حفلات موسيقية مجانية من الشرفة المركزية بفترات ما بعد الظهر والليل. Callejon del Beso (زقاق القبلة). بالكونات اثنين يفصل بينهم 69 سم فقط، عبارة عن موطن لأسطورة حب قديمة. راح يحجولك الأطفال القصة مقابل قروش قليلة.
mt: Union Park. Built to be the hall of a 17th-century monastery, the San Diego Union building is the only remaining part of the complex. It is used as a central square, and is always the site of nighttime and daytime events. There are several restaurants around the park, and free musical performances are often held on the central balcony in the afternoon and evening. Callejon del Beso (alley of the kiss). Two houses separated by 69 centimeters, is the home of an old love story. Children will tell you the story for a few pennies.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: يعتبر المشي لمسافات طويلة نشاط خارجي يتكون من المشي ببيئات طبيعية، تكون غالباً على مسارات المشي لمسافات طويلة. تشمل رياضة المشي لمسافات طويلة بالنهار المسافات اللي تقل عن ميلٍ واحد وحتى المسافات الأطول اللي يمكن تغطيتها بيوم واحد. يتطلب القيام برحلة نهارية على طول طريق سهل القليل من التحضيرات، ويمكن لأي شخص عنده لياقة معتدلة الاستمتاع بيها. احتمال تحتاج العائلة اللي وياها أطفال صغار إلى تحضيرات أكثر، لكن من الممكن قضاء اليوم بسهولة حتى ويه الرضع والأطفال دون سن المدرسة.
mt: Long-distance walking is an outdoor activity consisting of walking in natural environments, often on long-distance walking trails. Long-distance walking during the day includes distances less than one mile and up to longer distances that can be covered in one day.  A day hike on a flat trail requires little preparation, and can be enjoyed by anyone with moderate fitness. A family with young children may require more preparation, but a day hike can be easily accomplished even with infants and children under school age.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: """تتميز دولة """"النرويج"""" عادةً بوجود المضايق والوديان شديدة الانحدار، حيث تفسح فجأة الطريق أمام هضبة عالية، أو مستوية نوعاً ما. غالباً ما يشار إلى هذي  الهضاب باسم """"vidde""""، أي مساحة واسعة ومفتوحة وغير محدودة بلا أشجار. بروغالاند وأجدر عادة ما يُطلق عليهم """"هاي"""" بمعنى المستنقعات الخالية من الأشجار اللي غالباً ما تكون مغطاة بالخلنج."""
mt: """Norway is usually characterized by the fjords and steep valleys, where suddenly the road opens up to a high plateau, or at least somewhat flat. These plateaus are often referred to as """"vidde"""" (open, unbounded, and treeless), and Brogaland and Agder are often referred to as """"hei"""" (marshes without trees, which are often covered in birch)."""
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: يوصل موسم السياحة بمحطات التلال ذروته عامةً خلال الصيف بالهند. مع ذلك، يتمتعون بنوع مختلف من الجمال والسحر خلال الشتا، وتنزل كميات كبيرة من الثلج على العديد من محطات التلال وتقام أنشطة كالتزحلق والتزلج على الجليد.
mt: The tourist season peaks at hill stations during the summer in India. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during the winter, with large amounts of snowfall on many hill stations and activities like skiing and ice skating.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: تأكد إنو كلشي يكون واض أول ما توصل المرسى. راح تشوف المسافرين البقية اللي يطلبون التوصيل المجاني بالقوارب وراح يكَولولك المعلومات اللي يعرفوها. بشكل أساسي، راح تخلي إشعارات تعرض بيها مساعدتك، وتتنقل على أرصفة الموانئ، وتقترب من الناس اللي ينظفون يخوتهم، وتحاول تتواصل ويه البحارة بالحانة، إلخ. حاول تسولف ويه أكبر عدد ممكن من الأشخاص، وويه مرور الوقت راح تصير معروف للكل، وينطوك نصائح عن القوارب اللي تبحث عن شخص.
mt: You will be able to confirm that everything is fine before you arrive at the dock. You will see the other passengers who are requesting free boat transfers and you will tell them the information you know. Basically, you will leave notifications that you are helping, and you will move around the piers, and you will approach people who are cleaning their rooms, and you will try to communicate with the sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible, and over time you will become known to everyone, and you will get tips about boats that are looking for a person.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. src: تمنح جزيرة هونغ كونغ إقليم هونغ كونغ اسمه وهي المكان اللي  يعتبره العديد من السائحين قبلتهم. تشبه البنايات المصطفة اللي ترسم أفق هونغ كونغ بمخطط بياني براق يظهر فوق مياه ميناء فيكتوريا. حتى تحصل على أفضل المشاهد لهونغ كونغ، عوف الجزيرة واتجه إلى واجهة كولون البحرية بالجهة المقابلة. تتمركز الغالبية العظمى من التطور العمراني لجزيرة هونغ كونغ  بكثافة على أراضي مستصلحة على طول الشاطئ الشمالي. هذا هو المكان اللي استعملوه المستعمرينن البريطانيين كممكان خاص بيهم، وبالتالي إذا كنت تدور عن دليل على الماضي الاستعماري للمنطقة، فهذا خوش مكان حتى تبدي.
mt: Hong Kong Island is the place that many tourists consider their first stop. The buildings are lined up in a neat pattern that forms a colorful grid that stands out against the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best view of Hong Kong, turn around and face the waterfront of Victoria Harbour. Most of the urban development on Hong Kong Island is concentrated along the northern shore. This is where the British colonialists set aside land for themselves, so if you want to see a guide to the area's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: تعتبر الركائب دعامات لرجلين الخيال تتدلى على جوانب السرج. و توفر ثبات أكثر للخيال بس بيها مخاوف أمان بسبب احتمال أن تعصى رجلين الخيال بيها. إذا وكَع الخيّال من فوق الحصان وبقت رجله عاصيه بالطوق، ممكن يجره الحصان إذا ركض بعيد. أكو عدد من الاحتياطات اللي ممكن اتخاذها للتقليل من هذا الخطر. أولاً، يلبس  أغلب الخيّالين أحذية ركوب الخيل اللي بيها الكعب ونعل ناعم وكلش ضيق. ثانياً، تحتوي بعض السروج، وخاصة السروج الإنكَليزية، على قضبان أمان تسمح لجلد الِركاب بالانزلاق من السرج لمن ينسحب سحبه ليوره أثناء نزول الخيال.
mt: Stirrups are footrests for a rider's feet that hang from the sides of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but at the risk of the rider's feet being injured. If the stirrups are left dangling above the horse and the rider's feet remain in the stirrups, the horse may be injured if it bolts away. There are several precautions that can be taken to reduce this risk. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a soft sole and a narrow toe. Second, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety stirrups that allow the rider's feet to slide out of the stirrups if the rider is thrown off the horse while dismounting.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: تمثل شبكة تبادل الضيافة منظمة تربط المسافرين بالسكان المحليين بالمدن اللي راح يزوروها. عادة ما يتطلب الانضمام إلى هكذا شبكة تعبئة إستمارة على الإنترنت، رغم إنو بعض الشبكات تعرض أو تطلب تحقق إضافي. بعدها يتم تقديم قائمة بالمستضيفين المتوفرين سواء مطبوعةً و/أو عبر الإنترنت، ومرات تشمل مراجع وتقييمات من مسافرين آخرين. تم إطلاق منصة Couchsurfing بكانون الثاني 2004 لمن ما كَدر المبرمج كاسي فينتون أن يلكَي مكان للإقامة بأيسلندا بعد ما حصل رحلة طيران رخيصة لهناك. دز رسائل إلكترونية لطلبة بالجامعة المحلية واستلم كمية هائلة من عروض السكن المجاني.
mt: A hospitality exchange network that links travelers with local residents in the cities they are visiting. Usually joining such a network requires filling out an online form, although some networks also require additional verification. After that, a list of available hosts is provided either in print or online, and sometimes includes references and reviews from other travelers. Couchsurfing was launched in January 2004 by Casey Fenton, who wanted a place to stay in Iceland after getting a cheap flight there. He sent emails to local university students and received a huge amount of free accommodation offers.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: تلبي الفنادق الصغيرة احتياجات الشباب - فضيوفها المعتادين بالعشرينيات من أعمارهم - ولكن غالباً ما تلكَي مسافرين أعمارهم أكبر هناك همين. من النادر أن تشوف عائلات عدهم أطفال، بس تسمح بعض الفنادق الصغيرة للشباب أن ينزلون بالغرف الخاصة.
mt: Small hotels cater to the needs of young people - their usual guests in their twenties - but often these guests are older there they are. It is rare to see families with children, but some small hotels allow young people to stay in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: """يعتبر رمي البوميرانغ مهارة شائعة يريدون هوايه من السياح أن يتعلموها. إذا كنت تريد تتعلم رمي الخشبة المرتدة اللي ترجع لإيدك بعد ترميها، فلازم يكون عندك النوعية المناسبة من الخشب حتى ترجعلك. معظم """"بوميرانج"""" الموجودة بأستراليا ما ترجع بالواقع. من الأفضل للمبتدئين أن ما يحاولون رميها بالرياح القوية."""
mt: """Throwing boomerangs is a common tourist activity. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang that comes back to you after you throw it, you need the right kind of boomerang. Most ""boomerangs"" in Australia don't come back at all. It's better for beginners to try throwing them into the wind."""
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: يمثل الطعام الإندونيسي مصطلح عام يشمل مجموعة كبيرة من المطابخ الإقليمية المنتشرة بنواحي إندونيسيا، نظراً لوجود 17000 جزيرة بإندونيسيا حتى تقارن بينهم. لكن إذا  تم استعماله من دون مصطلحات إضافية، فمعنى المصطلح أقرب إلى إنو الأكل أصله من المناطق الوسطى والشرقية للجزيرة الرئيسية جافا. متوفر الآن على نطاق واسعٍ بجميع أنحاء جزر الأرخبيل، يتميز المطبخ الجاوي بمجموعة من الأطباق المتبّلة ببساطة، النكهات السائدة اللي يفضلها الجاويين هي الفول السوداني والفلفل والشكر (خاصة شكر جوز الهند الجاوي) والتوابل العطرية المختلفة.
mt: Indonesian cuisine is a term that covers cuisines native to the Indonesian archipelago. The various "culinary traditions" of the archipelago's diverse regions are distinctive and often locally unique. The cuisine of Indonesia has a variety of regional cuisines, including that of the country's main islands—Sumatra, Java, Kalimantan, Sulawesi, Bali, Flores, and Timor. The cuisine is also influenced by the country's many cultures that, combined, make up the nation. The four major Indonesian dishes are gado-gado, nasi goreng, sate, and soto. Indonesian cuisine is also characterised by the use of specific spices, such as temu kunci, asam kandis, daun salam, and kunyit. Indonesian cuisine is also characterised by the use of specific spices, such as temu kunci, asam kandis, daun salam, and kunyit.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: بالنسبة للأشخاص اللي ما عدهم إلمام بالمصطلحات الطبّيّة، كلمتي معدي وساري إلهم معاني مختلفة. المرض المعدي هو المرض اللي  يسببه كائن مسبب للمرض، مثل الفيروسات أو البكتيريا أو الفطريات أو الطفيليات الأخرى. المرض المعدي هو مرض ينتقل بسهولة بالتواجد بمحيط شخصٍ مصاب به. تطالب العديد من الحكومات بتلقيح الزوار اللي يدخلون أو يغادرون دولها ضد مجموعة من الأمراض. من المحتمل أن تستند هذي  المتطلبات غالباً على البلدان اللي زارها المسافر أو اللي يزورها.
mt: For people unfamiliar with medical terminology, the terms "infectious" and "contagious" have different meanings. An infectious disease is one caused by an infectious agent, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus, or other parasite. An infectious disease is one that is easily transmitted by contact with an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering or leaving their countries to be vaccinated against a number of diseases. These requirements are often based on the countries visited by the traveler.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: مقدمي خدمات الشبكة الخاصة الافتراضية الشخصية (VPN) هم وسيلة رائعة لخداع الرقابة السياسية والحجب الجغرافي التجاري لبروتوكول الإنترنت. فهي تتفوق على بروكسي الويب لعدة أسباب: فهي تعيد توجيه كل حركات المرور على الإنترنت، ومو بس عبر بروتوكول نقل النص الفائق. توفر عادة عرض نطاق ترددي أعلى وجودة خدمة أفضل، من الصعب التجسس عليها فهي مشفرة.
mt: Personal VPN services are a great way to circumvent political censorship and geographic commercial internet blocking. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: they redirect all internet traffic, and use the HTTP protocol. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better service quality, and are difficult to spy on, as they are encrypted.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: مقدمي خدمات الشبكة الخاصة الافتراضية الشخصية (VPN) هم وسيلة رائعة لخداع الرقابة السياسية والحجب الجغرافي التجاري لبروتوكول الإنترنت. فهي تتفوق على بروكسي الويب لعدة أسباب: فهي تعيد توجيه كل حركات المرور على الإنترنت، ومو بس عبر بروتوكول نقل النص الفائق. توفر عادة عرض نطاق ترددي أعلى وجودة خدمة أفضل، من الصعب التجسس عليها فهي مشفرة.

They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: they redirect all internet traffic, and use the HTTP protocol. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better service quality, and are difficult to spy on, as they are encrypted.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: ما راح تحتاج إلى استخدام شركة موبايل بالمكان الي راح تسكن بي أو تسافر إله لأن يتم توجيه المكالمات من خلال الإنترنت. ماكو همين أي شرط للحصول على رقم محلي من المجتمع اللي تعيش بي؛ تكَدر تحصل على اتصال إنترنت عبر الأقمار الصناعية ببراري تشيكن بألاسكا واختيار رقم يكَول إنك بولاية أريزونا المشمسة. عادةً، لازم تشتري رقم عالمي بشكل منفصل يسمح لهواتف شبكة الهاتف العامة بالاتصال بيك. ويشكل المكان اللي يجي منه الرقم فرق للأشخاص اللي يتصلون بيك.
mt: You won't need a mobile phone company in the place you're going to live or visit because calls will be routed through the internet. There's no such thing as a local number in the community you're living in; you can get internet access through satellites in Alaska and choose a number that says you're in sunny Arizona. Usually, you have to buy a separate international number that allows public phones to call you. The place where the number comes from makes a difference to people calling you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: النطق باللغة الإيطالية سهل نسبياً لأن تُنطق أغلب الكلمات مثل ما تنكتب بالضبط. الأحرف الرئيسية اللي لازم نراقبها  هي c و g، لأن لفظهم يختلف على أساس العلة التالية. تأكد أيضاً من نطق ر ورر بشكل مختلف: كارو تعني العزيز، بينما كارّو تعني عربة.
mt: Italian pronunciation is relatively easy because most words are pronounced as they are written. The main letters to watch out for are c and g, which are pronounced differently depending on the vowel that follows them. Also be sure to pronounce r, r, and rr differently: carro means "car", but carrò means "cart".
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: تعتبر مدينة إزمير ثالث أكبر مدينة بتركيا ويبلغ عدد سكانها حوالي 3.7 مليون نسمة، وبيها ثاني أكبر ميناء بعد اسطنبول، كما تعتبر مركز متميز للنقل. كانت مدينة سميرنا القديمة بيوم من الأيام، وهي الآن مركز تجاري حديث ومتطور ومزدحم، يقع حول خليج ضخم محاط بالجبال. تتميز الشوارع الواسعة والبنايات ذات الواجهات الجام ومراكز التسوق الحديثة بأسقف تقليدية من القرميد الأحمر وسوق القرن الثامن عشر والمساجد والكنائس القديمة، على الرغم من أن المدينة تتمتع بجو أكثر من أوروبا المتوسطية مقارنة بتركيا التقليدية.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey and has a population of about 3.7 million. It is the second largest port after Istanbul, and is a major center of transportation. The ancient city of Smyrna was one of the days, and is now a modern and developed commercial center, surrounded by a large bay surrounded by mountains. The wide streets and buildings with traditional red-tiled roofs, modern shopping centers, the 18th century market and old mosques and churches, despite the fact that the city enjoys a more Mediterranean European atmosphere than traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: تعتبر مشاهدة أزهار الكرز-المعروفة باسم هانامي- جزء من الثقافة اليابانية من القرن الثامن. إجه هذا المفهوم من الصين حيث كانت أزهار البرقوق هي الأكثر شعبية. باليابان، قام الإمبراطور بتنظيم أول حفلات أزهار الكرز حصراً لنفسه ولأعضاء آخرين من الطبقة النبيلة حول البلاط الإمبراطور.
mt: The viewing of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been part of Japanese culture since the eighth century. This concept originated in China, where plum blossoms were more popular. In Japan, the emperor organized the first cherry blossom viewing parties exclusively for himself and other members of the noble class around the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: القدس عاصمة إسرائيل وأكبر مدنها على الرغم إنو معظم الدول الأخرى والأمم المتحدة  ما تعترف بيها كعاصمة إلها. المدينة القديمة بتلال يهودا عدها تاريخ مذهل على امتداد آلاف السنين. المدينة مقدسة للأديان السماوية الثلاث - اليهودية، والمسيحية، والإسلام، وهي تعتبر مركز روحي، وديني، وثقافي. ونظراً للأهمية الدينية للمدينة، وخصوصاً المواقع العديدة بمنطقة البلدة القديمة، فإن القدس وحدة من الوجهات السياحية الرئيسية بإسرائيل. القدس بيها العديد من المواقع التاريخية، والأثرية، والثقافية، بالإضافة لمراكز التسوق، والمقاهي، والمطاعم الحيوية والمزدحمة.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital of Israel, although most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as such. The Old City of Jerusalem has a long and fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three major Abrahamic religions: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam, and is a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious importance of the city, especially the numerous sites in the Old City, Jerusalem is one of Israel's main tourist destinations. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological, and cultural sites, as well as lively shopping, café, and restaurant areas.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: يقع منتزه كروغر الوطني (KNP) بشمال شرق جنوب إفريقيا، ويمتد بمحاذاة حدود موزمبيق شرقاً، وزيمبابوي شمالاً، ويحده من الجنوب نهر كروكودايل. تبلغ مساحة المنتزه 19500 كم مربع وينقسم إلى 14 منطقة بيئية مختلفة، يدعم كل واحد منها حياة برية مختلفة. تُعتبر وحدة من المناطق الجذابة بجنوب إفريقيا، كما تعتبر منتزه رئيسي من المنتزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا ( منتزهات جنوب إفريقيا الوطنية). أكو أجور يومية للحفاظ على المنتزه والدخول إله،أسوة بجميع المتنزهات الوطنية بجنوب إفريقيا. ممكن يكون من المفيد أن تشتري بطاقة Wild Card، لأنها تسمحلك بالدخول لمجموعة مختارة من متنزهات جنوب إفريقيا أو جميع متنزهات جنوب إفريقيا الوطنية.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa, extending along the border with Mozambique to the east, and Zimbabwe to the north, and is bordered to the south by the Crocodile River. The park covers an area of 19,485 square kilometres (7,523 sq mi) and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, each supporting a variety of wildlife. It is one of South Africa's major national parks, and is managed by South African National Parks (SANParks). There is an entrance fee for the park, as well as for the rest of South Africa's national parks. It may be useful to purchase a Wild Card, as it allows you to enter a selected group of South African national parks or all of South Africa's national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: الجبل العالي فوق الطرف الشمالي من ماتشو بيتشو هو هذا الجبل شديد الانحدار، وغالباً ما يكون خلفية للعديد من صور الآثار. يبين الموضوع صعب من جوه، والصعود مالته شديد الانحدار وصعب، بس أغلب الناس اللي يتمتعون بلياقة معقولة المفروض يكَدرون يوصلون خلال 45 دقيقة. يخلون الدرجات الحجرية بامتداد أغلب المسار، وتوفر الكيبلات الفولاذية بالأقسام الأكثر انحدار مسند داعم. مع هذا، لازم تتوقع أن تنقطع أنفاسك، وتدير بالك بالأجزاء الأكثر انحداراً، خاصةً لمن تكون مبللة، لأن تصير سريعة بشكل خطير. أكو كهف صغير قريب من القمة لازم تعبر من خلاله، ويكون كلش ناصي وضيق.
mt: The high peak at the northern end of Machu Picchu is this steep slope, and is often the background for many of the archaeological photos. It is difficult to see from below, and the ascent is steep and difficult, but most people with average fitness should be able to reach it in 45 minutes. They climb the stone steps along most of the path, and the steel cables provide handholds in the steeper sections. However, you should expect to be out of breath, and to use your hands in the steeper sections, especially if you are wet, as it can be slippery. There is a small cave near the summit that you have to pass through, and it is narrow and dark.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: """بمطبخ مايوركا ، مثل بقية مطابخ مناطق البحر الأبيض المتوسط ، يعتمدون على الخبز والمخضر واللحم (خاصة لحم الخنزير) ، وبهذا المطبخ يستخدمون زيت الزيتون اكثر شي. يعتبر """"الخبز بزيت الزيتون"""" مثال على العشا الشعبي البسيط، خاصة خلال فصل الصيف: خبز بزيت الزيتون والطماطة وأي توابل متوفرة مثل: الجبن، وسمك التونة، وغيرها."""
mt: """In the kitchen of Majorca, like the rest of the kitchens of the Mediterranean areas, they depend on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and with this kitchen they use olive oil more than anything. The "bread with olive oil" is an example of the simple popular dish, especially during the summer: bread with olive oil and tomato and any available spices such as: cheese, tuna fish, etc."""
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: """تنطبخ """"وجبة هانجي"""" بحفرة حارة بالأرض. يتم تسخين الحفرة بالحجر الي يكون محمي على النار، أو ببعض الأماكن تخلي الطاقة الحرارية الأرضية مناطق من الأرض حارة بشكل طبيعي. غالباً ما يتم استخدام """"الهانجي"""" لطبخ عشا تقليدي مشوي. تقدم عدة أماكن بروتوروا وجبة الهانجي المطبوخة بحرارة الأرض بينما يمكن تذوق وجبات هانجي أخرى بكرايستشيرش وويلنجتون وأماكن أخرى."""
mt: """Hāngi is cooked in a pit oven. The pit is heated by rocks that are heated in a fire, or in some places, the geothermal heat of the ground naturally heats areas of the ground. Hāngi is often used to cook traditional māori roast. Several places offer hāngi cooked by geothermal heat while other hāngi can be tasted in Christchurch and Wellington and other places."""
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: خلال زيارة الأديرة، يُطلب من النسوان يلبسن التنانير اللي تغطي الركبتين ولازم يغطن أكتافهن همين. توفر أغلب الأديرة عبايات للنسوان اللي يجن ومو متحضرات، بس إذا جبتي العباية مالتج، وخاصةً إذا كانت ملونة، فراح تحصلين على ابتسامة من الراهب أو الراهبة عند المدخل. ونفس الشي ينطبق عالرجال،لازم يلبسون سراويل تغطي الركبتين. وممكن تاخذ واحد من المخزن الي بالمدخل، بس هذي الملابس ما تنغسل بعد كل مستخدم، لذلك ممكن ما تكون مرتاح إذا لبستها. بالنسبة للقياس فأكو قياس وااحد يناسب كل الرجال!
mt: During a visit to a monastery, women are asked to wear skirts that cover the knees and elbows. Most monasteries provide robes for women who are not dressed and are not married, but if you bring your own robe, you will get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. The same applies to men, they must wear pants that cover the knees. You can take one from the store at the entrance, but these clothes are not washed after each user, so it may not be comfortable if you wear them. As for the size, take a size and one fits all men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
